name: Vodka Schweppes
description: Simple sweety drink that you can take wherever you are in your own local style

ingredients.ingredient: Schweppes of your preffered taste, I like the Citrus found in Brazil but you can use other flavors

directions: Mix the vodka and the soda in the cup, preferrably addding the vodka first so it blends well and that's it! Your homemade Smirnoff Ice aka Vodka Schweppes
